amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules made by the Secretary of Veterans' Affairs from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to exempt rules made by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs from the additional provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 15).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 15).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
